![Actor path](/images/ActorPath.png)
# Actor References, Paths and Addresses
# Actor 引用, 路径和地址
## What is an Actor Reference?
## 什么是 Actor Reference?
- Local actor references when remoting is enabled are used by actor systems which support networking functions for those references which represent actors within the same CLR.
- 启用远程处理时的本地Actor引用由Actor系统使用，该Actor支持表示同一CLR内的Actors的那些引用的联网功能.
- Purely local actor references are used by actor systems which are not configured to support networking functions.
- 单纯本地actor引用被actor 系统使用，没有配置支持网络功能
- Remote actor references represent actors which are reachable using remote communication, i.e. sending messages to them will serialize the messages transparently and send them to the remote CLR.
-远程Actor引用代表使用远程通信可访问的Actor，即向他们发送消息将透明地序列化消息并将消息发送给远程CLR.
- There are several special types of actor references which behave like local actor references for all practical purposes:
- 出于各种实际目的，有几种特殊类型的actor 引用，行为类似于本地Actor引用：
- There is a subtype of local actor references which is used for routers.
- 存在本地Actor引用的子类型作为路由器使用
- `DeadLetterActorRef` is the default implementation of the dead letters service to which Akka routes all messages whose destinations are shut down or non-existent.
-`DeadLetterActorRef`是Akka死信函服务的默认实现，Akka将目的地被关闭或不存在的所有的消息路由到这个地址。
- `PromiseActorRef` is the special representation of a `Task` for the purpose of being completed by the response from an actor.
-`PromiseActorRef`是为了通过某个actor的回应完成的`Task`的特殊表示。
An actor reference is a subtype of `ActorRef`, whose foremost purpose is to support sending messages to the actor it represents.
一个 actor 引用是 `ActorRef`的一个子类型, 最主要的用途是支持发送消息到它代表的actor。
Conversely, during message processing the actor has access to a reference representing the sender of the current message through the sender method.
反过来，在消息处理过程中， actor通过Sender方法访问当前收到的消息的发送者的引用。
Each actor has access to its canonical (local) reference through the `Self` property; this reference is also included as sender reference by default for all messages sent to other actors.
每一个 actor 通过`Self`属性访问它的规范 (本地l)引用，这个引用也是缺省包含在它发到其他actor的所有消息中，作为sender .
In order to also be reachable when sent to other network nodes, these references include protocol and remote addressing information.
为了在发送到其他网络节点时也可以访问，这些引用包括协议和远程寻址信息.

It ties into the central idea that [Actor Systems](xref:actor-systems) form intrinsic supervision hierarchies as well as that communication between actors is transparent with respect to their placement across multiple network nodes.
这关系到中心思想 [Actor Systems](xref:actor-systems) 形成内在的监督层次和在跨多个网络节点的位置上，actors之间的通信是透明的
Its logical structure is the same as for the aforementioned local references, but sending a message to them dispatches to one of their children directly instead.
它的逻辑结构与上述的本地引用相同，但是发送消息直接发送给他们的一个孩子。
The above image displays the relationship between the most important entities within an actor system, please read on for the details.
上面的图片显示了一个actor系统中最重要的实体之间的关系，请详细阅读。.
There are several different types of actor references that are supported depending on the configuration of the actor system:
有几种不同类型的actor引用，这取决于参与者系统的配置：
These actor references will not function if sent across a network connection to a remote CLR.
如果通过网络连接发送到远程CLR，这些Actor引用将不起作用.
This chapter describes how actors are identified and located within a possibly distributed actor system.
本章描述了actors是如何在一个可能分布的参与者系统中被识别和定位的.
`ICanTell.Ask` creates this actor reference.
`ICanTell.Ask`创建这个actor引用。
